doc.title: A Year in the Life of John Mathews, a Homeless Person
doc.plot: Ever wonder why someone who is homeless remains that way? Gino Salerno provides a glimpse into the life of one man as he struggles through every day. Sleeping, eating, spirituality, entertainment, friends, jobs, family, conflicts are all a part of John's daily existence through one whole year. A Year in the Life of John Matthews, A Homeless Man is a poignant documentary portrayal of how easily any of us could join this predicament.
